title: In Yana, the Touch of Undying
description: In Bramt Hex's world, would-be inframage at the Glorak academy, the name Yana is not often spoken. Hex didn't know at all about it up until destiny makes him meet a demon that wants to buy a very strange building. Discovering that Yana is a lost city, almost unreachable, were you might get immortality is enough to turn on the interest on the young student. This way begins an adventurous pilgrimage in a universe inhabited by giants and vampires, mages and grumpy trees, lovely orcs and strange omunculus, up till the spectral city and the answers are even more mysterious.... Yana.
author: Michael   Shea
